name: astro-indie-template
title: Astro indie Template
desc:
This is a simple clean, fun website template created with Astro.js primarily targeted at indie game developers.

Live Demo - https://indieastrotemplate.netlify.app/
article:
This is a simple clean, fun website template created with Astro.js primarily targeted at indie game developers.


The template includes


Astro JS


Server-Side Rendering


Tailwind CSS & Flowbite Integration


Home and Devlog (Blog) Page


Search feature


Search by Tags


Search by Terms
